tag_list: technology, blogger, iphone, apple, startups, facebook, youtube, partnership
overview:
Michael Andrew is a columnist, developer and video producer.

Michael Andrew is a technology columnist covering the general consumer technology market, focusing on Apple and its competitors in general. He also review products and write about start-ups occasionally.

In addition to writing for his own site, Forwarded, he also write for TekSocial, where he serve as a contributing editor. Topics Michael write about there includes services, product reviews, general opinions as well as anything else that comes to mind on that day.

Previously, he has been a video producer working under the YouTube Partnership Program.

On the deverloper side of things, Michael is the founder of Forwarded Unlocks, a company that provides AT&T iPhone unlocking service. Aside from that, he also develop websites for people and companies from time to time.
